query:
UPDATE 
                http_trigger 
            SET 
                route_path = $1, 
                route_path_key = $2, 
                full_route_path_key = $3, 
                workspaced_route = $4, 
                script_path = $5, 
                path = $6, 
                is_flow = $7, 
                http_method = $8, 
                static_asset_config = $9, 
                edited_by = $10, 
                email = $11, 
                is_async = $12, 
                requires_auth = $13, 
                edited_at = now(), 
                is_static_website = $14
            WHERE 
                workspace_id = $15 AND 
                path = $16
